body:
In the Card Explorer and Deck Editor, cards (artifacts) with a mana cost of {0} are lost amongst the land cards. They also don't show a {0} mana cost symbol.

A cost=null should be separated from cost={0}
author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
title: Mana cost {0} not showing clearly in Card Explorer

comments.body:
Nice work - Although there's still some cost=null cards slipping through the net and being given a mana cost of {0} (Going the other way now, hehe), although they might just be because they are also in the scripts_missing folder.

For example, Lotus Bloom, Ghastly Haunting, Evermind. Suspend, Flip and 'awkward' cards respectively :)
